verses.text: \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*,

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w also|strong="H8034"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w set|strong="H5414"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*; \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w hath|strong="H6440"\w* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w*, \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w to|strong="H5414"\w* \w profane|strong="H2490"\w* \w my|strong="H5414"\w* \w holy|strong="H6944"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w then|strong="H7760"\w* \w I|strong="H7760"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w set|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w against|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w family|strong="H4940"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w will|strong="H5971"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w*, \w and|strong="H5971"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H5971"\w* \w play|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* after \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w play|strong="H2181"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w harlot|strong="H2181"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w Molech|strong="H4432"\w*, \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w among|strong="H7130"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w ye|strong="H6213"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* \w my|strong="H8104"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*: \w I|strong="H3068"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* sanctifieth \w you|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* everyone \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w curseth|strong="H7043"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* father \w or|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* mother \w shall|strong="H1818"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*: \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w hath|strong="H3588"\w* \w cursed|strong="H7043"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* father \w or|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* mother; \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \w shall|strong="H1818"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* upon \w him|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w that|strong="H7453"\w* committeth \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w* \w with|strong="H4191"\w* \w another|strong="H7453"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w*’s wife, \w even|strong="H7453"\w* he \w that|strong="H7453"\w* committeth \w adultery|strong="H5003"\w* \w with|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H4191"\w* \w neighbor|strong="H7453"\w*’s wife, \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w adulterer|strong="H5003"\w* \w and|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w adulteress|strong="H5003"\w* \w shall|strong="H7453"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w*.
